findings.title: Wrong allowance calculations
findings.description: In transferFrom(address _from,…), allowance decreases with taxes included recalculated value, but should be decreased by initial function argument value.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax and burn fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the tax and burn fee.

findings.title: Owner can change fee address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee address.

findings.title: Owner can mint any amount of tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint any amount of tokens without restrictions.
